Facepunch: give me source content...

Me: * cries and shoves $ 8 into the ATM *

Я уже дано задумывался на счёт обзора этой игры. И никак не мог понять, СТОИТ-ЛИ ПОКУПАТЬ?
Ну приступим.
Плюсы: Во первых если вы не имеете друзей, то это почти идеальная игра для поиска друга по интересам, но если у вас есть уже друг то вам будет весело как 1 на 1 так и в multiplayer-e. И даже эта игра пойдёт на не топовом пк (что не могу сказать про CS:GO. Читеры есть везде, но их тут по крайней мере МЕНЬШЕ чем в CS:GO да и VAC не сравниться с серверными анти-читами. Также если вам страхово на счёт того что стрельба различаеться, то я вам могу сказать одно: стрельба ПОЧТИ не отличается от CS:GO. Разнообразные сервера.
Это все плюсы.
Теперь минусы: Игра уже старая да и оружия как-то криво названны (как в CS 1.6). Также одни задроты играют на серверах, поэтому вам прийдётся учиться там и стрелять как бог так и иметь реакцию как у зайца. Да и вы не очень-то и похвастаитесь между товарищами о том что у вас CS:S.
На самом деле РЕШАТЬ ВАМ покупать или не покупать. Надеюсь что помог с выбором.

The classic game of all time

Great Game. The game has a great dynamic and a unique feel. Gives a great perspective of a Socialist government.

The actual definition of socialism has to do with the individual workers owning the means of production via programs such as workers' cooperatives or direct democracy.
It's probably all a pipe dream beyond anything at a small communal scale because inefficiencies of such a governing system as opposed to a meritocracy in which the extremely competent direct capital allocation are rather extreme. The unequal distribution of intelligence and talent indicates that there will always be some form of stratification in ownership, decision, and production processes.
None of the countries claimed to be commonly socialist i.e. Norway, Sweden, Denmark, Germany, what have you are actually socialist, they are state capitalist with extensive welfare states and/or social safety nets, which desu is fine because such a system has shown itself to stand pretty much head and shoulders above all else in terms of advancement of technology and lifestyles while also ensuring that the populace is happy.

I suppose after years of owning this game from a Half Life 2 steam voucher I should review it.  

First of all this FPS has stood the test of time.  Graphics have always looked good, it has a large player base even to this day.  Yes, there are even mod's to this game (orignally a mod itself).  

What I like about this game:
- Different weapons, forcing you to be creative in the way that you fight. (ex. TMP vs Scout)
- Short rounds.  If you want something to do to quickly kill time then this is  your game.
- It does not force you to stay unlike other games you can freely hit Escape and Quit.
- Large player Dust2 servers (Let the Rushes BEGIN!)

What I hate about this game:
- Terrible mic users (no fault of the game).  Seriously, learn how to set one up and run a few tests before running in.
- Some servers are an AWPooring AWPfest.  
- Grumpy mic chat people and high voiced tweens.
- People putting too much into this game.   Public servers should not be Competative deal with it. 

Overall, a hilariously fun game to play with any weapon combination that you choose.  When this game ever is blessed with Gaben's Glorious discount, buy without hesitation.
In my opinion the best game out,  still from 10 years ago till now !!
